org.nuxeo.build.maven

Class VerifyMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.nuxeo.build.maven.AntBuildMojo
        • org.nuxeo.build.maven.VerifyMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.SurefireReportParameters

    @Mojo(name="verify",
      defaultPhase=VERIFY,
      threadSafe=true,
      requiresProject=true,
      requiresDependencyResolution=TEST)
public class VerifyMojo
extends AntBuildMojo
implements org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.SurefireReportParameters
    Verify if a summary file exists (created by integration tests). If the file exists and contains errors, then throw a MojoFailureException.
    See Also:
    IntegrationTestMojo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Boolean failIfNoTests
      Set this to "true" to cause a failure if there are no tests to run.
      protected String reportingEncoding
      The character encoding scheme to be applied.
      protected boolean skipITs
      Set this to true to skip running integration tests.
      protected boolean skipTests
      Set this to true to skip running tests.
      protected File summaryFile
      The summary file to read integration test results from.
      protected File[] summaryFiles
      Additional summary files to read integration test results from.
      protected boolean testFailureIgnore
      Set this to true to ignore a failure during testing.

        @Parameter(property="maven.test.failure.ignore",

protected boolean testFailureIgnore
        Set this to true to ignore a failure during testing. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
